name: 1 Pepper Road

ay so I didn't get to finish this in time :c the post-credits scene is supposed to tell you your stats but uhh, yeah, it's cut off lmao. If you don't see a number in the post-credits, then hey, congrats, you didn't let the poor flowers die :D Also, music is missing in the credits scene, and you win twice heh
